contentrichtext.text: '''Futura''' may refer to: * [[Futura (typeface)]] * [[Futura (magazine)]] * [[Futura (cooker)]] a product of Hawkins Cookers Limited ==Business== * [[Futura International Airways]] * [[Futura Gael]], the Irish subsidiary airline of Futura International Airways * [[Tikal Futura]], a shopping, business and hotel complex in Guatemala City * [[Futura plus]], a Serbian wholesale and retail company ==Vehicles== * [[Aprilia Futura]], a motorcycle * [[Lincoln Futura]], a Ford concept car * [[Ford Futura]], a car made by Ford Australia ==Music and entertainment== * [[Futura 2000]], a graffiti artist * [[Futura (tv channel)]], Brazilian educational channel * [[Gibson Futura]], an electric guitar * [[Futura Records]], a French record company and Jazz label * [[Radio Futura]], a Spanish pop rock group * [[Diva Futura]], an Italian pornography and erotica film studio * [[Diva Futura (album)|Diva Futura]], an album by the Greek metal band Nightfall * [[Rai Futura]], an Italian entertainment TV channel * Futura, the name of the [[Maschinenmensch]] in the original script of the film ''Metropolis'' ==Publishing== * Futura, a now defunct British paperback publisher, part of Robert Maxwell's [[British Printing & Communications]] corporation ==Sport== * [[FC Futura]], a football club from Finland * [[Futura Cup]], a hockey trophy of the Ligue Nord-Americaine de Hockey, Quebec ==Plants== * [[Salix futura]], a species of willow native to Japan {{disambig}}
